articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Messi's Argentina beat Neymar's Brazil to win Copa America - New Straits Times
articles.description: RIO DE JANEIRO: Superstar Lionel Messi won his first trophy with his national team as Angel Di Maria's goal gave Argentina a 1-0 win over hosts Brazil in the Copa America final on Saturday.
